meanings.definition: Relating to rabbis or their teachings.
meanings.sent1: The rabbinic teachings were passed down through generations.
meanings.sent2: She studied the rabbinic texts to learn more about Jewish traditions.
meanings.sent3: The rabbinic advice on marriage made everyone laugh at the wedding.
meanings.sent4: His actions were a rabbinic reflection of wisdom and guidance.
meanings.sent5: The rabbinic influence in the community was profound and respected.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Jewish rabbinate.
meanings.sent1: The rabbinic leaders gathered to discuss important matters.
meanings.sent2: Her family had a long history of rabbinic service to the Jewish community.
meanings.sent3: The rabbinic attire was colorful and ceremonial.
meanings.sent4: His speech carried a rabbinic authority that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The rabbinic traditions were upheld with reverence and dedication.

meanings.definition: Characteristic of or resembling the teachings of the rabbis.
meanings.sent1: Her actions had a rabbinic wisdom that inspired others.
meanings.sent2: The rabbinic influence could be seen in every aspect of the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The rabbinic humor in his stories always brought a smile to people's faces.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a rabbinic paradise of peace and contemplation.
meanings.sent5: The rabbinic guidance provided a moral compass for the community.
